page.title: 15Education D/Worth W. Grove
page.content: Denchworth has no school. A school bus takes 12 children to and from Hanney Primary School. One has to go by bus to Wantage for secondary schooling and also for any adult education. In Grove, there are 3 play groups and 1 private nursery school. There are 2 primary schools in Grove, Millbrook Primary being in W. Grove and having 11 classes and 250-300 pupils. The classrooms there are all open plan (with no closed rooms). The children go into Wantage by bus, bike or car, to one of three schools for children 11-16 and to the Sixth Form College 16-19. There is an Adult Education Centre in Grove opposite Millbrook School. Children from 3-11 having private education go to our school, St. Andrew's in Wantage or to schools further away in Abingdon.
